TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示使用客户端应用程序服务进行窗体身份验证的用户登录信息。

span.span: Represents user login information for forms authentication by using client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由 接口使用。The class is used by the interface. 实现此接口时，必须在实现中返回此类的已填充实例 。When you implement this interface, you must return a populated instance of this class in your implementation. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何实现 返回此类的实例的方法。The following example code demonstrates how to implement the method, which returns an instance of this class. 在此示例中，该 方法是登录对话框类的一部分。In this example, the method is part of a login dialog box class. 方法会显示对话框，然后返回 使用用户指定的值初始化的实例。The method displays the dialog box, and then returns a instance initialized with the user-specified values. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Login.cs#210)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Login.vb#210)]

span.span: Gets or sets the user password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在身份验证期间使用此属性来检索用户密码。The class uses this property to retrieve the user password during authentication. 通常不会在应用程序代码中使用此属性。You will not typically use this property in your application code. 相反，你将使用类构造函数来设置用户密码。Instead, you will use the class constructor to set the user password.
